English.Text: "Must be Brugmansiaâ€” also known as the Devil's trumpet." Your clergyman is acutely aware of local religion, and knows the flower is used to induce spiritual delirium. "Once the demon trumpet has been exorcised from his belly, I shall lead both the boy and his parents to a higher place," he says with a self-satisfied air, "and this sort of thing need never happen here again." Rightly or wrongly, your expedition will leave feeling it has done fine missionary work.
